mapper.select: SELECT S.CSTICKER_NO AS stickerNo, S.CONTENT AS content FROM ( SELECT CSTICKER_NO FROM VIEW_ALLSTICKER WHERE AC_NO = #{acNo} GROUP BY CSTICKER_NO) T LEFT JOIN STICKER S ON T.CSTICKER_NO = S.CSTICKER_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYCHECKTAG(MC_TAG_NO, CHECK_NO, CSTICKER_NO) VALUES(MYTAGSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{checkNo}, #{stickerNo})
mapper.select: SELECT CHECK_NO AS checkNo FROM ( SELECT CHECK_NO, CHECKDATE, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY CHECKDATE DESC) AS FAST FROM CHECKLIST WHERE AC_NO=#{acNo} )T WHERE T.FAST =1
SELECT M.MC_TAG_NO AS stickerNo, S.CONTENT AS content FROM MYCHECKTAG M, STICKER S WHERE M.CSTICKER_NO(+) = S.CSTICKER_NO AND CHECK_NO=#{checkNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STICKER(CSTICKER_NO, CONTENT, AC_NO) VALUES(CSTICKERSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{content}, #{acNo})
mapper.select: SELECT T.CSTICKER_NO AS stickerNo FROM ( SELECT CSTICKER_NO, RANK() OVER(ORDER BY CSTICKER_NO DESC) AS FAST FROM STICKER WHERE AC_NO= #{acNo} ) T WHERE T.FAST=1
